name: Paradise Road
description:
This is a classic flying shooting game with exquisite and gorgeous graphics. The overall environment is mainly centered around space, and the high fidelity sound effect presents players with a different shooting experience. Simple operation, shake the mouse to move left and right. Hold down the left mouse button to automatically fire bullets, and move up and down to avoid strong enemies. What players need to do in the game is to drive a fighter jet, continuously eliminate enemies, and survive.

Exciting flying shooting.



Fly an airplane freely in the air.

Bringing you the most shocking experience.

Cleverly dodge oncoming enemy planes to avoid being hit head-on.

There are too many enemies waiting for you, can you excellently complete the challenge.
